solution.text:
Slant height of the tent,l\(=_{j}_\)cm
Radius of the tent,r\(=_{k}_\)cm
\(l^2=r^2+h^2\)
\(\Rightarrow h=\sqrt{l^2-r^2}\)
\(\Rightarrow h=\sqrt{_{j}_^2-_{k}_^2}\)
\(\Rightarrow h=_{{trunc(((j**2-k**2)**Decimal(0.5)),2)}}_\)cm
Therefore, height of the tent is \(_{{trunc(((j**2-k**2)**Decimal(0.5)),2)}}_\)cm.
